items.title: The Stealth Campaign That’s Getting Your Kids Hooked on Chess
items.abstract: Pandemic boredom and a Netflix mini-series, “The Queen’s Gambit,” added to the game’s sudden popularity. But Chess.com was also plotting its own moves.

items.title: The 15-Minute City: Where Urban Planning Meets Conspiracy Theories
items.abstract: Is having all of life’s amenities within a 15-minute walk convenient? Or is it a government leash? We explain.

items.title: With Karl Lagerfeld, the Clothes Were Only Part of the Story
items.abstract: The fashion world’s hunger for larger-than-life figures glorified the designer. But a cozy new biography shows him to be more business whiz than artist.
keywords: Paradise Now: The Extraordinary Life of Karl Lagerfeld (Book)

items.title: Rural Life
items.abstract: New books by Lynn Darling, Suzanne McMinn, Bryce Andrews and Evelyn I. Funda.

items.title: Geography’s Role in the Life Expectancy of the Poor
items.abstract: A study provides strong evidence of the positive effects that state and local health policies can have on people’s lives.
